description: Lighter homemade sweet and sour sauce works perfectly with juicy prawns.
name: Spicy Sweet & Sour Prawns Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 cloves garlic, peeled and finely chopped
1 medium red onions, peeled and chopped into chunks
2 large red capsicums, chopped into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the onions and capsicums for 3-4 minutes, add the garlic and chilli flakes and cook for 1 minute.
Stir in the ketchup, apple cider vinegar, soy sauce and pineapple chunks and juice and cook for 1 minute.
Toss in the prawns and cook until pink, about 2 minutes, and serve immediately.
